title: The Mongolian Village - Blair
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Create your own stir fry and pay by the weight. Has plenty of vegan options including protein items, veggies and sauces. You pick all the ingredients and give to chefs to grill on a flat wok grill. Tell them you are vegan; will cook with different utensils. Meals come with a choice of hot and sour soup or another fresh vegetable soup option. All you can eat rice is also complimentary with your meal. A 10% discount for vegans and vegetarian meals. Reservations are not required but are accepted.
